title: S15 Ep91: Wandering Wraiths, Pesky Poltergeist, and Unwanted Attachments
itunes:title: Wandering Wraiths, Pesky Poltergeist, and Unwanted Attachments
description:
Darkness Radio encounters Wandering Wraiths, Pesky Poltergeist, and Unwanted Attachments with guest Jim Hunt.


Jim Hunt is a popular medium that has been featured on TV and is a sought after personality and a person adept at removing problem spirits. Today Jim shares insights into his work, shares stories of helping spirits to move on, and gives advice on how to deal with your own paranormal attachments. 

Visit Jim here: https://www.jimhuntofficial.com/

Get great paranormal books and gifts here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
